name: Cyberhanfu 赛博国风/Cyber Chinese style
description:
Cyber Chinese Style is a model combines traditional elements of Hanfu/cheongsam with futuristic cyber-mechanical elements, presenting a unique visual effect. In the painting of cyber Hanfu/cheongsam, traditional elements such as pleats, patterns, and accessories are combined with mechanical elements such as metal structures, electronic components, and dazzling lights, creating a unique futuristic style.

The main trigger words are: cyberhanfu, cheongsam, Chinese clothes.

Recommended base models: AWportrait, lyriel, Guofeng3, majicMIX reverie, chilloutmix.

Recommended prompt：1 girl, chinese_clothes,  in pink,cyberhanfu, Cheongsam, cyberpunk city, dynamic pose, Headdress, hair ornament, long hair, cyberpunk, a high-tech city, full of machinery and futuristic element, futurism, technology

【赛博国风】此模型将传统的汉服/旗袍元素与未来主义的赛博机械元素相结合，呈现出一种独特的视觉效果。在赛博汉服的绘画中，传统的汉服/旗袍元素，如褶皱、花纹和配饰，与机械元素，金属构造、电子元件和炫彩灯光相结合，创造出一种独特的未来主义风格。

主要触发词为：cyberhanfu, cheongsam, chinese_clothes,

搭配底模：【AWportrait】【lyriel】【国风3】【majicMIX reverie】【chilloutmix】

prompt建议：1 girl, chinese_clothes,  in pink,cyberhanfu, Cheongsam, cyberpunk city, dynamic pose, Headdress, hair ornament, long hair, cyberpunk, a high-tech city, full of machinery and futuristic element, futurism, technolog

这个版本整体的服装会偏向旗袍，泛化性还不错，很多大模型都适用。并且最让人惊喜的是在不同大模型下的构图以及画面氛围都有差异。可以尝试和各种赛博元素场景以及科技感载具/道具的关键词一起食用，非常带感！

服装颜色也可以多尝试双色的搭配，蓝粉、黑红、蓝白、红绿都是些不错的组合。

动作的话目前站姿和坐姿（sitting）比较容易触发，其动作就需要看和模型的适配度和泛化度是否足够触发了。

示例图为【AWportrait】【lyriel】【国风3】【majicMIX reverie】下的效果, 全部为原图直出

希望大家多多尝试，欢迎交流！

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description:
The clothing in this version leans towards cheongsam and has good generalization, making it suitable for many large models. What's even more surprising is that the composition and atmosphere of the image differ depending on the different base models. You can try combining it with various cyber elements, as well as keywords related to technology-related vehicles and props for a more immersive experience.

For clothing color, you can also try pairing two colors together, such as blue/pink, black/red, blue/white, or red/green, which all make for great combinations.

As for movements, currently standing and sitting poses are more easily triggered, but it depends on whether the animation is compatible and generalized enough with the model.

The example images are all produced directly from the model：

AWportrait https://civitai.com/models/61170/awportrait,

lyriel https://civitai.com/models/22922/lyriel

Guofeng3 https://civitai.com/models/10415/3-guofeng3

majicMIX reverie https://civitai.com/models/65055/majicmix-reverie

I hope that everyone will try it out and welcome any feedback or suggestion!
